text: Ara kora'anera madhyame tomadera prati e'i hukuma jari kare diyechena ye, yakhana allaha taâ€™ alara ayatasamuhera prati asbikrti jnapana o bidrupa hate sunabe, takhana tomara tadera sathe basabe na, yataksana na tara prasangantare cale yaya. Ta na hale tomara'o tadera'i mata haye yabe. Allaha doyakhera majhe munapheka o kapheraderake eka'i jayagaya samabeta karabena.
